text: Music for a New Society is the eighth studio album by multi-instrumentalist John Cale. It was released in October 1982. It was his first full-length album on ZE Records label. It was produced by Cale himself. == Track listing == # "Taking Your Life in Your Hands" # "Thoughtless Kind" # "Santies" # "If You Were Still Around" # "Close Watch" # "Mamas Song" # "Broken Bird" # "Chinese Envoy" # "Changes Made" # "Damn Life" # "Risé, Sam and Rimsky-Korsakov" # "In the Library of Force" == Personnel == * John Cale − vocals, guitar, keyboards * Allen Lanier − guitar * David Young − guitar * Chris Spedding − guitar * David Lichtenstein − drums * John Wonderling − autoharp * Mike McLintock − background vocals * Robert Elk − bagpipes * Tom Fitzgibbon − bagpipes * Risé Cale − vocals on "Risé, Sam and Rimsky-Korsakov" Category:John Cale albums Category:1982 albums
title: Music for a New Society
